title: Banijay Entertainment - Wikipedia
snippet: Banijay Entertainment was formed in January 2008 through the successive acquisition of production companies, first in France then internationally under the leadership of Stéphane Courbit (who was previously the CEO of Endemol France) alongside Groupe Arnault, the Agnelli and De Agostini families ...

title: Banijay Group is a leader in the entertainment business
snippet: Banijay Group’s (formerly FL Entertainment) successful listing on the Amsterdam Stock Exchange in July 2022 represented a significant milestone in its growth story and a culmination of a 15-year+ history of remarkable expansion.

title: Our Story - Banijay
snippet: Banijay is the world's largest independent content creation Group for television and multimedia platforms. Banijay is present in 16 territories. ... We are a collective of multi-talented on and off-screen creatives from 25 territories, united in ambition and diverse in thinking.

title: Banijay UK (company) - Wikipedia
snippet: A month later in July of that year, French production & distribution company Banijay Group (who owns its British subsidiaries) completed its merger with Endemol Shine UK's Dutch-based global production and distribution parent Endemol Shine Group from The Walt Disney Company and Apollo Global Management turning Banijay Group into a global international production and distribution titan as Endemol Shine UK became Banijay's new British production division with Banijay placing all of its British subsidiaries such as RDF Television and IWC Media (the two were former Zodiak Media subsidiaries) into the acquired Endemol.Shine UK division and had it renamed to Banijay UK although it retained the former name until 2023.

title: Banijay Entertainment - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Banijay Entertainment (formerly known as Banijay Group and Banijay) is a French media company established in 2008. On February 23, 2016, they merged with Zodiak Media Group and folded all of the latter's subsidiaries.
